title: In the Labyrinth
brief_description: A multi-image large-format film retelling of the Greek myth of Theseus and symbolizing the life of a modern man; each one in a personal labyrinth that must find their own path to triumph.

constellations_other.name: Big screen dreams
constellations_other.description: With groundbreaking technology and a unique cinema experience, today IMAX theatres are not only loved by audiences but championed by pioneering filmmakers like Christopher Nolan and James Cameron. Yet the route to get there was an unconventional one.

description: A multi-image large-format film retelling of the Greek myth of Theseus and symbolizing the life of a modern man; each one in a personal labyrinth that must find their own path to triumph.
